title: Yin and Yang
description:
It is absolutely freezing in the studio (00:01:00). Chris teased the possibility of a Quantum Week split last week and they quickly made it official (00:05:00). Magnolia tickets are set to go on-sale Thursday (00:14:00). Joe Rogan apologizes after Spotify makes changes following Neil Young leaving the platform (00:16:30). Kirk gears up for a big trivia match against Brandon Walker (00:40:00). Adam Schefter reports that Tom Brady is retiring but Brady's camp is now saying he's day-to-day (00:44:00). Chris is not a fan of his hotel accommodations & much more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
